events: Accepted as one of 5 HCMUS representatives for the KIT Online Spring School 2023.
Awarded a full scholarship of 50M VND for the Global Developer Scholarship by MindX and Code For Vietnam Foundation.
Won Third place for GameUIT Hackathon with Trassify

Got the paper "Gamified solution to enhance students' interest in History - Immersion Learning and Gamification" accepted for oral presentation, and awarded Best Paper at the International Student Science Forum 2022, HCMC.
Joined LEAN Social as a Software Engineer.
Started my first internship as a Software Engineering Intern at Tiki.
Accepted in for VNUHCM - University of Science, Advanced Program in Computer Science, class of 2025.
